00040   std::string Event::toString() {
00041     string dstr;
00042 
00043     dstr = "Event: type=";
00044     if (type == CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED)
00045       dstr += "CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED";
00046     else if (type == DISCONNECT)
00047       dstr += "DISCONNECT";
00048     else if (type == MESSAGE) {
00049       dstr += "MESSAGE protocol=";
00050       if (header->protocol < Header::PROTOCOL_MAX)
00051         dstr += Header::protocolStrings[header->protocol];
00052       else
00053         dstr += "unknown";
00054       dstr += (std::string)" id=" + (int)header->id;
00055       dstr += (std::string)" gid=" + (int)header->gid;
00056       dstr += (std::string)" headerLen=" + (int)header->headerLen;
00057       dstr += (std::string)" totalLen=" + (int)header->totalLen;
00058     }
00059     else if (type == TIMER)
00060       dstr += "TIMER";
00061     else if (type == ERROR)
00062       dstr += "ERROR";
00063     else
00064       dstr += (int)type;
00065 
00066     if (error != Error::OK)
00067       dstr += (std::string)" \"" + Error::get_text(error) + "\"";
00068 
00069     if (type != TIMER) {
00070       dstr += " from=";
00071       dstr += (std::string)inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr) + ":" + (int)ntohs(addr.sin_port);
00072     }
00073 
00074     return dstr;
00075   }
00076 
00077 }
